javadoc: Action to show the version history for a single version controlled domain file in the repository.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates an action to show the version history for a single version controlled 
 domain file in the repository.

params.name: plugin
params.comment: the plug-in that owns this action.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if a single version controlled domain file is being provided.
methods.name: isEnabledForContext
methods.comment: Returns true if a single version controlled domain file is being provided.

methods.javadoc: Displays a dialog with the version history for the provided domain file.
methods.name: showHistory
methods.comment: Displays a dialog with the version history for the provided domain file.

name: VersionControlShowHistoryAction
comment: Action to show the version history for a single version controlled domain file in the repository.
